sentences.english: We all trials and hardships to walk, past experience has stopped.

sentences.english: The profound affection is sinking, unhurriedly stops, so reaches the very heart of life.

sentences.english: Stop-motion animation has the special artistic charm and the characteristic.

sentences.english: Not much, if any of the pale fingertips jump, cold, frozen at the moment of memory.

sentences.english: But, how do you capture lightning in photographs?

definition: with a grunting sound it stops (idiom); to come to an end spontaneously (esp. of sound)
covered in dust/dusty/lying unused for a long time
to stay somewhere temporarily/to stop over
to take a curtain call/(fig.) to come to an end
the curtain drops/the end of the show
eternal/everlasting/fig. to pass into eternity (i.e. to die)
one instant/very short time/the twinkle of an eye
